H0.text: Which play by Sir Peter Shaffer was made into a film with Tom Hulce in the title role. Equus

H1.text: Which play by Sir Peter Shaffer was made into a film with Tom Hulce in the title role. Black Comedy

H2.text: Which play by Sir Peter Shaffer was made into a film with Tom Hulce in the title role. The Royal Hunt of the Sun

H3.text: Which play by Sir Peter Shaffer was made into a film with Tom Hulce in the title role. AMADEUS

A4.text: The 1984 film adaptation of Amadeus starred Tom Hulce as Mozart.
